contentrichtext.text: {{Unreferenced|date=December 2009}} {{Infobox Radio Station | name = XHITT-FM | image = | area = [[Tijuana, Baja California]]| branding = | slogan = | airdate = | frequency = 88.7 ([[megahertz|MHz]])| format = [[Public Radio]]| erp = 1,150 [[Watt]]s | haat = 139 meters| class = A | owner = Instituto Tecnologico de Tijuana| website = | callsign_meaning = | }} '''XHITT-FM''' 88.7 is a Public [[radio station]] in [[Tijuana, Baja California|Tijuana]], [[Mexico]]. {{Tijuana Radio}} {{coord missing|Mexico}} {{DEFAULTSORT:Xhitt-Fm}} [[Category:Radio stations in Tijuana]] [[Category:Radio stations established in 1983]] {{Mexico-radio-station-stub}}
